description: 2KEN08/231 Support for development and implementation of Vision 2030 Medium Term Plan

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: to strengthen the capacity of the Office of the Prime Minister and its Ministry of State for Planning, National Development and Vision 2030 for enhanced efficiency, effectiveness, in the formulation, Monitoring & Evaluation and delivery of pro-poor planning and policies. It will support the government in participatory development of the second Vision 2030MTP with an appropriate macro-economic framework.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: 2KEN08/231 Vision 2030 support
